name: DeleteCall
description: Delete a Call record from your account. Once the record is deleted, it will no longer appear in the API and Account Portal logs.

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Call resource(s) to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided Call SID that uniquely identifies the Call resource to delete
